title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 ยง 420.1 - Applicability
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 ยง 420.1 - Applicability

State Regulations

Comprehensive Ambulatory HIV Programs (CAHP) are programs
approved at facilities established under article 28 of the Public Health Law
which provide the full range of ambulatory care clinical services, as described
in this Part, appropriate for the continuous care of patients who have been
diagnosed with HIV, whether symptomatic or asymptomatic. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10
ยง
420.1

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
